scripts.dev: concurrently -p "[{name}]" -n "UI,DB,GQL" -c "bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgBlue.bold" "yarn ws:ui dev" "yarn ws:db build --watch" "yarn ws:codegen generate --watch"
scripts.ts:check: yarn ws:codegen ts:check && yarn ws:db ts:check  && yarn ws:ui ts:check && yarn ws:e2e ts:check
scripts.test:e2e: yarn ws:db build && yarn ws:tdi timetables-data-inserter:build && CYPRESS=true yarn ws:e2e cypress run --browser chrome
scripts.test:e2e:open: yarn ws:db build && yarn ws:tdi timetables-data-inserter:build && CYPRESS=true yarn ws:e2e cypress open
scripts.test:e2e:parallel: yarn ws:db build && yarn ws:tdi  timetables-data-inserter:build && yarn ws:e2e cypress-parallel --script cy:run --threads 3 --verbose --reporterModulePath '../node_modules/cypress-multi-reporters' --specsDir 'e2e/*.cy.ts' --weightsJson './parallel-weights.json'
scripts.qa: yarn --frozen-lockfile && yarn ws:db build && yarn ws:tdi  timetables-data-inserter:build && yarn ts:check && yarn prettier:check && yarn lint && yarn test && yarn test:integration && yarn test:e2e
